page.title: 10HOLIDAY PATTERNS
page.content: Traditionally the Pottery Industry of North Staffordshire takes its annual holidays during the last week of June and the first week of July with a further week at the end of August.Of the people in the area of this survey 69% went away on holiday during the June/July break which is called the Potters' Holiday.19% were going on holiday during the 5 weeks' school holiday beginning at the end of July. 17% also went away in June/July.12.2% were going to stay at home.In the British Isles the favourite area to visit was Wales with many enjoying a stay in Cornwall.For a holiday abroad some visited France,Belgium and Germany but the most popular destination was definitely Spain,including Minorca, Majorca,Ibiza and the Canary Islands. The popular destinations for all of North Staffs.were Greece & Jugoslavia.
